      • dateCreatorByUser

        private java.time.LocalDate dateCreatorByUser​(java.util.Scanner scanner,
                                              java.lang.String dateName,
                                              boolean isFieldsCanBeSkipped)
                                       throws IncorrectValueException,
                                              EmptyValueException
        Create date from user input
        Parameters:
        scanner - that uses for entering city by user
        dateName - Name of event. Example: день *рождения*, день *основания* (в родительном падеже)
        isFieldsCanBeSkipped - if true this field of city can be skipped
        Returns:
        LocalDate of this event
        Throws:
        IncorrectValueException - if date doesn't exist
        EmptyValueException - if day, month, year is empty

      • isNormalDate

        private boolean isNormalDate​(int day,
                             int month,
                             int year)
        Date validation
        Parameters:
        day - integer day of month
        month - integer month
        year - integer year (greater than 0)
        Returns:
        true if date can exist else false else

      • localTimeCreateByUser

        private java.time.LocalTime localTimeCreateByUser​(java.util.Scanner scanner,
                                                  java.lang.String timeName,
                                                  boolean isFieldsCanBeSkipped)
                                           throws IncorrectValueException,
                                                  EmptyValueException
        Parameters:
        scanner - that uses for data entering by user
        timeName - Name of event. Example: час *рождения* минута *основания* (в дательном падеже)
        isFieldsCanBeSkipped - if true this field can be skipped
        Returns:
        LocalTime object
        Throws:
        IncorrectValueException - if hour/minute is incorrect
        EmptyValueException - if hour/minute is empty
